statements: SELECT * FROM dietary_preferences;
SELECT customer_name, preference_1 FROM dietary_preferences WHERE dietary_restriction = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT customer_name, dietary_restriction FROM dietary_preferences ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, preference_1, preference_2 FROM dietary_preferences WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT dietary_restriction FROM dietary_preferences;
SELECT customer_name, dietary_restriction FROM dietary_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM dietary_preferences WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, dietary_restriction FROM dietary_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'Vegan' AND preference_2 = 'Gluten-Free';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, dietary_restriction FROM dietary_preferences ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT dietary_restriction FROM dietary_preferences;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type, price FROM MenuOptions ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM MenuOptions WHERE dietary_info = 'Vegetarian' AND price < 20.00;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM MenuOptions WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT dish_name, ingredients, price FROM MenuOptions WHERE dietary_info = 'Vegetarian' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, dietary_restrictions, preferences FROM Customers WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NOT NULL AND preferences IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers INNER JOIN MenuOptions ON Customers.customer_id = MenuOptions.option_id WHERE MenuOptions.price < 20.00;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, dietary_restriction FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT option_name, cuisine_type FROM MenuOptions ORDER BY cuisine_type DESC;
SELECT customer_name, option_name, order_date FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, option_name FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE dietary_restriction_compatible = 'Yes';
SELECT customer_name, dietary_restriction FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT option_name, cuisine_type FROM MenuOptions WHERE dietary_restriction_compatible = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT customer_name, option_name, order_date FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, option_name, cuisine_type FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN MenuOptions m ON o.option_id = m.option_id WHERE c.dietary_restriction = 'Vegan' AND m.cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) as total_orders FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, dietary_restrictions FROM Customers WHERE preferred_cuisine = 'Italian';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MenuOptions WHERE price < 10.00;
SELECT option_id, cuisine_type, dish_name FROM MenuOptions WHERE cuisine_type = 'Mexican' ORDER BY dish_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE preferred_cuisine = 'Italian';
SELECT customer_name, dietary_restrictions FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT dish_name, ingredients, price FROM MenuOptions WHERE cuisine_type = 'Japanese' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT customer_name, dish_name, rating FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id INNER JOIN MenuOptions m ON o.option_id = m.option_id WHERE c.dietary_restrictions IS NULL AND m.ingredients LIKE '%gluten%' AND o.order_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Ratings r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2) GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers;
SELECT name, dietary_restrictions FROM customers WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, difficulty_level FROM recipes ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE 'U%';
SELECT c.name as customer_name, r.name as recipe_name FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN customers c ON cp.customer_id = c.id JOIN recipes r ON cp.recipe_id = r.id;
SELECT * FROM countries;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, difficulty_level FROM recipes WHERE country_code = 'USA';
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, r.name AS recipe_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_preferences cp ON c.id = cp.customer_id JOIN recipes r ON cp.recipe_id = r.id;
SELECT m.id AS option_id, r.name AS recipe_name, c.name AS country_name FROM menu_options m JOIN recipes r ON m.recipe_id = r.id JOIN countries c ON r.country_code = c.code;
